description:
Female pianists are to be favoured over men, according to the rules of a leading piano competition under which judges are instructed to "consider" picking a woman "in the case of a tie".

The post Female Pianists Favoured Over Men Under Major Competition’s Rules appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Female Pianists Favoured Over Men Under Major Competition’s Rules

description:
The real 'climate change deniers' are those who deny the climate was changing before we started burning fossil fuels, says geologist Dr. Matthew Wielicki.

The post The Real ‘Climate Change Deniers’ Are Those Who Deny the Climate Changed Before We Started Burning Fossil Fuels, Says Geologist appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: The Real ‘Climate Change Deniers’ Are Those Who Deny the Climate Changed Before We Started Burning Fossil Fuels, Says Geologist

description:
A British schoolchild suffering from 'species dysphoria' has been officially allowed to identify as a wolf.

The post British School Allows Pupil Suffering from ‘Species Dysphoria’ to Identify as a Wolf appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: British School Allows Pupil Suffering from ‘Species Dysphoria’ to Identify as a Wolf

description:
Next has said it could be forced to close stores after losing a landmark legal battle over equal pay and being forced to pay store staff the same as warehouse workers. Why on earth are courts trying to set wages?

The post Next Warns of Store Closures After Being Ordered by Court to Pay Store Staff the Same as Warehouse Workers appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Next Warns of Store Closures After Being Ordered by Court to Pay Store Staff the Same as Warehouse Workers

description:
Being vaccinated against Covid sharply increased the risk heart attack patients would die or suffer heart failure after heart attacks, a major new peer-reviewed study in leading journal Vaccine shows.

The post Covid Vaccines Sharply Raise Risk of Death or Heart Failure, Major New Peer-Reviewed Study Shows appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Covid Vaccines Sharply Raise Risk of Death or Heart Failure, Major New Peer-Reviewed Study Shows

description:
The BBC's Justin Rowlatt claims climate change is "turbo-charging" problems in Somalia. But the country has had near stationary temperatures and rainfall for 100 years, says Chris Morrison.

The post BBC’s Rowlatt Claims Climate Change is “Turbo-Charging” Problems in Somalia Despite Temperatures and Rainfall Being the Same as 100 Years Ago appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: BBC’s Rowlatt Claims Climate Change is “Turbo-Charging” Problems in Somalia Despite Temperatures and Rainfall Being the Same as 100 Years Ago

description:
A summary of the most interesting stories in the past 24 hours that challenge the prevailing orthodoxy about the ‘climate emergency’, public health ‘crises’ and the supposed moral defects of Western civilisation.

The post News Round-Up appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: News Round-Up
